title: We are now for accepting BULK ORDERS of Purefoods Jamon De Bola -1 kg for this coming December 2013...

attachments.displayName:
We are now for accepting BULK ORDERS of Purefoods Jamon De Bola -1 kg for this coming December 2013.
Deadline for submission of your orders is until November 14, 2013

This is to ensure all purchase orders will be produced and delivered by Christmas Season.
Weight: 1 kg
Packaging: comes with appropriate Purefood Ham paper bag

Perfect for giveaways, gift for your families, friends and loved ones, also good for business and extra income.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
1. BULK ORDER & PRICE
QUANTITY UNIT PRICE
60 - 300 pieces Php 265/piece
301 - 599 pieces Php 260/piece
600 pieces up = Php 255/piece
(Quantity per box IS 6 pieces, to avoid any lacking on quantity, I suggest to set your orders divisible by 6)

The SRP for Purefoods Ham at shopping malls right now is Php360 to Php 390 by December 2013, especially when few days left Christmas Day.

This set price is based on corporate account and so it is being offered much lower than in the market. Total orders reaches out up to around 50-70 metric tons in volume.
Since this is a corporate account, it is 100% guaranteed that your orders are produced by Purefoods.

PAYMENT
This offer is SAFE & FAIR both for Seller and Buyer.
To ensure that all orders are binded to both parties, Buyer are requested to issue:
60% Partial Payment upon confirmation of your orders
40% Full Payment 4 days before pick-up schedule
No more payments accepted on pick-up dates, only issuance of confirmed order quantity

Last year POLICY was based on 100% FULL PAYMENT REQUIREMENT upon placing of orders. But due to best effort of the Team, 60% partial payment are now accepted by Purefoods Management

WITH PAYMENT TERMS SPECIFIED ABOVE, PUREFOODS GUARANTEES THAT ALL ORDERS PLACED ARE FIRM AND SERVED IN DUE TIME.

DELIVERIES
Pick-up can be made on 2 assigned locations tentatively within Dec 12-19, 2013:
1. San Rafael, Santo Tomas Batangas and
2. General Trias Cavite Proper

PICK-UP ONLY, NO DELIVERY AT YOUR PLACE REGARDLESS OF ORDER QUANTITY

Commitments & Responsibility:
1. Seller guarantees her responsibility to place your orders in advance and issue your quantity requirement on agreed pick-up dates.
2. Buyer guarantees that ordered quantity submitted by November 20, 2013 will be completely paid in due time and receive actual items by December 2013 on agreed dates and time.
3. Buyer need to advice in advance his prefer pick-up location in order to quantify volume and schedule of deliveries by December 2013
4. Seller guarantees Buyer that closed transaction on pre-ordered ham is safe, realiable and secure.

We are both dealing on REAL & RIGHT PERSON, SCAM-FREE AND BOGUS TRANSACTION!!!
Both of us will be worry-free thinking of HOW REAL IS OUR DEAL.

Avoid season rush, order your festive ham as early as today.
Order quantity should be EXACT & FIRM, additional quantity after ordering deadline is no longer possible

THANKS A LOT FOR ALL THE BUYERS WHO GIVES THEIR TRUST AT MY LITTLE ANGELS ONLINE SHOP last December 2012!

We did it last year and hoping that in God's grace, we will all be successful as business partners :)
I am excited to work with my previous Customers and praying for NEW Customers to include in my list :)

Should you have any concerns, feel free to contact me at 09053137147
